desc:
The colláis is a large, deer-like creature covered in thick, black fur. A great rack of antlers grows from its thick skull, in which prominent eye sockets display two red embers for eyes. The monster has no mouth; instead, a coarse beard grows in its place._  
**Summoned Protector.** If a forest village is in danger, the villagers might perform a ritual sacrifice to summon a colláis. Once the ritual is complete, the creature appears in the branches of a nearby tree. It then stalks the village and its surroundings. A colláis returns to its home plane after 24 hours.
name: Colláis
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks
languages: understands Common and Sylvan but can’t speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The colláis makes one gore attack and two hooves attacks.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Cry of the Forest
actions.desc: The colláis sounds a dreadful and reverberating call. Each creature within 100 feet of the colláis that can hear the cry must succeed on a DC 16 Charisma saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the colláis's Cry of the Forest for the next 24 hours. Forest-dwelling beasts and monstrosities with an Intelligence of 4 or lower automatically succeed or fail on this saving throw, the colláis's choice.

special_abilities.name: Impale and Toss
special_abilities.desc: When the colláis hits a Medium or smaller creature with a gore attack, it can use a bonus action to impale and toss the creature. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or take 11 (2d10) piercing damage and be flung up to 10 feet away from the colláis in a random direction and knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The colláis has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
